(Innate.)
Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, make it Ethereal and draw 1 card.
If it is a Void, gain [E].

Unplayable.

relics.name: Broken Vessel
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 2 vesselmod:Soul.
relics.flavorText: not the boss, YOU are the vessel.

relics.name: Spore Shroom
relics.description: Whenever you use a "Focus" card, deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: i swear, this is not a fart relic.

relics.name: Glowing Womb
relics.description: You are always considered to have vesselmod:Infection. Whenever you apply vesselmod:Infection to an enemy, apply 1 additional vesselmod:Infection.

relics.name: Grubsong
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP, gain 1 vesselmod:Soul.
relics.flavorText: sorry, no grubs in this mod.

relics.name: Salubra's Blessing
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power, gain 2 vesselmod:Soul.
relics.flavorText: no smooches included. have some soul instead.

relics.name: King's Brand
relics.description: You only take up to 8 vesselmod:Infection damage.

relics.name: Kingsoul
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 vesselmod:Soul.

relics.name: Spell Twister
relics.description: Whenever you play a vesselmod:Spell, gain 1 vesselmod:Soul.
relics.flavorText: refunding is just like discounting, right...?

relics.name: Voidtouched Focus
relics.description: Void-corrupt all Vengeful Spirit, Desolate Dive and Howling Wraiths. You can only play 1 vesselmod:Spell per turn.

relics.name: Pure Vessel
relics.description: Replaces Broken Vessel. Gain 3 maximum vesselmod:Soul capacity. At the start of each combat, gain 5 vesselmod:Soul.
relics.flavorText: picking this up wont turn you into one, and you wont do double damage.

relics.name: Soul Binding
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Lose 3 maximum vesselmod:Soul capacity.
relics.flavorText: can't run pantheons with this, sorry

relics.name: Soul Eater
relics.description: Whenever you deal non-Spell attack damage, gain 1 additional vesselmod:Soul.

relics.name: Tyrant's Soul
relics.description: The first time you use vesselmod:Soul each turn, gain [E] and draw 1 card. Start each combat with vesselmod:Overloaded_Focus.

relics.name: Shaman Stone
relics.description: ALL your vesselmod:Spells deal 50% more damage.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: Overloaded Focus
keywords.description: Whenever you draw a card that costs Soul, randomize its Soul cost.

keywords.name: Soul Vessel
keywords.description: You can only hold Soul up to the maximum capacity of your Soul Vessel.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Note, spaces are not allowed in NAMES. For multi-word keywords, see the next one.

keywords.name: Charm
keywords.description: Unique Powers with effects that do not stack.

keywords.name: Infection
keywords.description: Infected creatures take damage whenever Infection is applied. Each turn, Infection is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Metallicize
keywords.description: At the end of every turn, gain Block.

keywords.name: Soul
keywords.description: Auto-played cards do not cost Soul. When an enemy receives non-Spell attack damage, gain 1 Soul.

keywords.name: Spell
keywords.description: Powerful Attacks that cost Soul to cast.

mods.name: The Vessel
mods.description:
Modded character based on the Knight/Vessel from Hollow Knight by Team Cherry.
 All custom assets belong to Team Cherry, the developers of Hollow Knight.
 This character mod is also inspired by The Bug Knight mod by Venim.

 If you haven't played Hollow Knight yet, do it now before Silksong comes out. You won't regret it.
 
 Currently supported languages: English, Simplified Chinese (TL: Timale)
